_source.text: 1941 Correspondent: John M. Callahan 3 Preacher Road- Milton, MA 02186; 617-698-2082 1942 Correspondent: John C. Fitzgerald 22 Joyce Road Hyde Park, MA 02136-3807; 617-364-2309 A wise old man proclaimed that being old isn't bad and infinitely better than the alternative.

text: Correspondent: John C. Fitzgerald 22 Joyce Road **Hyde** **Park**, MA 02136-3807; 617-364-2309 A wise old man
proclaimed that being old isn't bad and infinitely **better** **than** the alternative.

_source.text: After a: being caretaker of the Hyde Park Mem· dal is much better than selling $Oap 1 the Arabs in the Saharn.

text: After a: being caretaker of the **Hyde** **Park** Mem· dal is much **better** **than** selling $Oap 1 the Arabs in the Saharn.
